d: Sandy is an adaptable circle skirt pattern.

s.cutWaistband.d: The **Waistband** (2) is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.

waistbandWidth.d: Controls the width of the waistband.

waistbandPosition.d: Controls the position of the waistband.

waistbandShape.d: Whether you want a straight or shaped waistband.

waistbandShape.straight.d: Draft a pattern with a straight waistband

waistbandShape.curved.d: Draft a pattern with a curved waistband

circleRatio.d: The percentage of a circle you want the skirt to be.

waistbandOverlap.d: The amount by which the waistband overlaps.

gathering.d: The percent by which the top of the skirt is longer than the bottom of the waistband.

lengthBonus.d: Determines how long the skirt will be.

seamlessFullCircle.d: Enables a seamless full circle skirt.

seamlessFullCircleNo.t: Draft less than a full circle skirt
seamlessFullCircleNo.d: Drafts a pattern for the exact circle ratio you request

seamlessFullCircleYes.t: Draft a pattern for a full circle skirt
seamlessFullCircleYes.d: This allows you to cut the skirt on a double-fold
